tpl.about_short: Find Wares IT is a global catalog of descriptions and prices for off-lease and used computer equipment for home and office.
tpl.about: Find Wares IT is a global catalog of descriptions and prices for off-lease and used computer equipment for home and office. We help you choose and purchase the right model at the best price in online stores. In the catalog, you will find all the necessary information for selection: product comparisons, model selection by parameters, detailed descriptions, name-based search, user reviews, photo galleries, a glossary of terms, reviews, manuals, product ratings, expert recommendations, a brand catalog, and much more.
